ti:edition.ti:label: De Abrahamo
ti:edition.ti:description: Philo Judaeus. Cohn, Leonard, editor. Opera quae supersunt, Volume 4. Berlin: Reimer, 1902.

ti:translation.ti:label: De Abrahamo
ti:translation.ti:description: Philo of Alexandria, "A TREATISE ON THE LIFE OF THE WISE MAN MADE PERFECT BY INSTRUCTION OR, ON THE UNWRITTEN LAW, THAT IS TO SAY, ON ABRAHAM," translator: Charles Duke Yonge (George Bell and Sons, London, 1854)
